flawed_nl_solution:
Half the pet-owners have a cat because 1 - 1/2 = 1
There are 30 pet owners because 30 / (1) = <<30/(1)=30>>30
The town has 50 citizens because 30 / 0.6 = <<30/0.6=50>>50

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1/2, not 1. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
